question: Who clinched the 2019 men's singles title at the Barcelona Open Tennis tournament?
explanation: Dominic Thiem clinched the 2019 men\'s singles title at the Barcelona Open Tennis tournament. In the final, he defeated Daniil Medvedev  by 6-4, 6-0 at the Real Club de Tenis Barcelona in Barcelona, Spain.  With this feat, Thiem  has become the first Austrian to take the Barcelona title since Thomas Muster in 1996.
